content: FRANKFURT Labor unions have secured guarantees for a planned merger of Linde  and U.S. rival Praxair   saying on Friday there would be no forced layoffs at Linde in Germany until Dec. 31  2021 in case of a tie-up.
name: Praxair Inc
title: No forced layoffs in Germany by 2021 if Linde  Praxair merge: union

content: FRANKFURT Germany's Linde agreed to revive talks with U.S. rival Praxair  to create a $65 billion industrial gases giant which will have its main operations run from Connecticut  two sources familiar with the deal said on Wednesday.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde resumes merger talks with Praxair  CEO resigns

content: FRANKFURT Praxair's and Linde's shareholders are to own equal parts in the industrial gases group created by a proposed merger of the two companies  people close to the deal said.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Merged Praxair  Linde to 50:50 percent owned by each: sources

content: FRANKFURT Praxair enticed prospective merger partner Linde into resuming negotiations by offering to locate some central functions of the combined group in Germany  two people familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Parts of mooted Praxair-Linde group to be run out of Germany: sources

content: FRANKFURT Linde  supervisory board Chairman Wolfgang Reitzle is still in favor of a tie-up between the German industrial gases maker and U.S. rival Praxair   which has made a renewed merger proposal  German newspaper Handelsblatt reported.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde chairman backs deal with Praxair: Handelsblatt

content: * Confirms company has approached Linde AG about resuming discussions regarding a potential merger
name: Praxair Inc
title: BRIEF-Praxair confirms it has approached Linde AG about resuming discussions regarding potential merger

content: * Says received revised proposal concerning a potential merger of equals with Praxair Inc
name: Praxair Inc
title: BRIEF-Linde receives revised merger proposal from Praxair

content: FRANKFURT/MUNICH U.S. industrial gases group Praxair  has revived efforts to combine with German rival Linde   seeking to overcome differences over key personnel and location of headquarters that scuppered previous talks in September.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde considers fresh merger overture from Praxair

content: MUNICH/FRANKFURT German industrial gases group Linde's  supervisory board is expected to discuss a fresh merger overture by Praxair  at its next regular meeting on December 7  a person familiar with the matter told Reuters on Wednesday.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde board likely to discuss Praxair approach on December 7: source

content: FRANKFURT  Nov 29 German industrial gases group Linde has received a fresh approach from U.S. rival Praxair for a merger of equals and its executive board is reviewing the proposal.
name: Praxair Inc
title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 2-Linde considers fresh merger overture from Praxair

content: FRANKFURT  Nov 23 Germany's Linde is in talks with China's acquisitive transportation and leisure giant HNA Group over its temperature-controlled logistics unit Gist  two people close to the matter said.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde in talks with HNA about logistics unit Gist - sources

content: * Praxair expands on-site business for wastewater customers in China
name: Praxair Inc
title: BRIEF-Praxair expands on-site business for wastewater customers in China

title: BRIEF-Praxair signs contract with Meglobal  expands carbon dioxide capabilities in U.S. Gulf coast

content: MUNICH  Germany German industrial gases group Linde  is not considering reviving merger talks with rival Praxair   its outgoing chief executive told Reuters on Friday.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde CEO says no question of reviving Praxair talks

title: INTERVIEW-Linde CEO says no question of reviving Praxair talks

content: MUNICH  Germany  Oct 28 German industrial gases group Linde can have a bright future even if it does not merge with a rival  its chief executive said on Friday after merger talks with U.S. peer Praxair failed last month.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde CEO says company has much potential without merger

content: MUNICH  Germany  Oct 28 Germany's Linde   the world's biggest maker of industrial gases by sales  said on Friday it had launched a new efficiency programme following the collapse last month of its merger talks with U.S. rival Praxair.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde launches new savings programme after failed merger

content: * Praxair Inc - has started up its second air separation plant and is extending its pipeline system in Port of Antwerp
name: Praxair Inc
title: BRIEF-Praxair starts up its second air separation plant

content: FRANKFURT  Oct 7 Linde  the world's biggest industrial gases group by revenue  plans to cut costs and may and may close some sites abroad after failing to merge with U.S. rival Praxair  German weekly Spiegel reported.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde plans to cut costs after Praxair merger -Spiegel

content: FRANKFURT  Sept 16 Germany's financial markets regulator BaFin on Friday said it had launched a routine investigation into whether industrial gases supplier Linde  held back information about the departure of top executives for too long.
name: Praxair Inc
title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-Financial regulator investigates timing of Linde announcements

title: BRIEF-Linde: executive board decides to end talks with Praxair

content: BERLIN  Sept 13 The chief executive of Linde  will not stay on when his contract expires next year  the industrial gases company said on Tuesday  joining the chief financial officer in departing after merger talks with U.S. rival Praxair collapsed.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde CEO to step down after Praxair deal falls through

content: FRANKFURT  Sept 12 The DAX top-30 index  looked set to open 1.6 percent lower on Monday  according to premarket data from brokerage Lang & Schwarz at 0644 GMT.
name: Praxair Inc
title: German stocks - Factors to watch on September 12

title: BRIEF-Praxair Inc and Linde AG terminate preliminary talks about a potential merger

content: FRANKFURT  Sept 13 Linde said its finance chief Georg Denoke was leaving the management board  effective Tuesday  a day after merger talks ended between the German industrial gases group and U.S. rival Praxair.
name: Praxair Inc
title: Linde CFO leaves after Praxair talks collapse

content: NEW YORK/MUNICH U.S. industrial gas supplier Praxair Inc  and German peer Linde AG  are in early-stage talks about a merger to create a market leader with a value of more than $60 billion  Linde said on Tuesday  sending shares in both companies higher. | Video

title: Gas suppliers Praxair  Linde hold merger talks
